name: Demetrius J. GRANT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of August, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

121 A.3d 434
